title: DJ sona over Pulsefire ezreal?
body:
Title says it all! Personally, I prefer the looks and display of PFE (Pulsefire ezreal) more, but everyone says that it's not worth it, and it looks clucky and needs an update. I recently bought Ezreal and find him so much fun to play. I still play Sona too, and I really like the creativity for the DJ sona skin. Which one is actually worth it's money? As I am only buying one of the two... And don't tell me to buy neither, as I will be buying one or the other, I just need help choosing the right one! 

Comment below! 

Thanks...

replies.body:
Which one do you play more? Buy the skin for that champion.

Personally, I like DJ Sona just because I love Sona but I think both are fine skins.
Buy it for the champ you enjoy the most :)
I personally like Spirit Guard Udyr better (But maybe thats because I think Udyr is a badass) {{champion:77}} =P
{{item:3124}}  is getting an update... ik some people get that on him... hmmm... its fun to use on him as it is now... hmm... but buffs... even better???
Yay! A rioter :D, tell me, out of PFE or DJ sona, what is your personal favourite?

PFE is extremely cool love all the animations and evolving model on it. 

BUT DJ Sona IMO is better. love the music and model that you can change on command.

Thanks bro! I think I'll stick with my gut, and go with PFE, as I don't really play Sona that much anyways. I prefer other supports like tahm kench and bard...

Thanks for the reply though!

Keep up the good work, love what your doing!
IMO Sona is the way to go. Ez as i have said before too clunky. Although if you do not play much Sona and play a lot of Ez perhaps Ez would be the way to go for you?

id say your getting more value from dj sona as she is more interactive. her skin gives your team music during the game , as you can toggle her dj set on/off during the match. id say theres alot more visual effort put into her skin too.
